data.title: ST STANISLAUS SCHOOL
data.meta_description:
1 review of ST STANISLAUS SCHOOL "In a recent incident on10/13/2022 a teacher verbalized to a student that she had a "kill list" including killing herself, students, and staff. The principle sent the teacher home. The student made this issue known at 12.45 PM and the police were not called for another four hours, after the teacher was allowed to leave. This is a blatant disregard for student and staff safety and this principle should be removed from their position and not allowed to be a school administrator at any point in the future. Thankfully no students or staff were harmed.

https://abc7chicago.com/east-chicago-indiana-schools-teacher-kill-list/12325359/"
data.text: Claim your business to immediately update business information, respond to reviews, and more!
